markdownRemark.excerpt: Focusing on the middle of the tree with a shallow depth of field wasn’t a good idea in hindsight - it does not help at all with the way the tree looks squashed…
markdownRemark.html: Focusing on the middle of the tree with a shallow depth of field wasn’t a good idea in hindsight - it does not help at all with the way the tree looks squashed at the bottom. Should try having the focus point at the top or bottom planes of focus to see how that would turn out.
